story-moment.ACCIDENT AND RECOVERY: Doctor Stephen Strange is in a terrible car accident, resulting in injuries to his hands that stop him from being able to continue working as a surgeon.
story-moment.TRAINING AT KAMAR-TAJ: Strange begins to master the mystic arts under the tutelage of the Ancient One, aided by Mordo.
story-moment.BARGAINING WITH DORMAMMU: Doctor Strange uses the Eye of Agamotto’s power to force Dormammu into a bargain to save the Earth.
story-moment.THE SEARCH FOR ODIN: When Thor comes looking for his father, Odin, on Earth, Doctor Strange offers him assistance.
story-moment.FIGHT ON TITAN: On Titan, Doctor Strange joins several other heroes in a battle against Thanos, attempting to remove the Infinity Gauntlet from his hand.

powers+abilities.MASTER OF THE MYSTIC ARTS: As a Master of the Mystic Arts, Doctor Strange possesses incredible magical knowledge and power, able to conjure powerful spells within moments.
powers+abilities.ASTRAL PROJECTION: Doctor Strange can send his astral projection away from his body.
powers+abilities.TELEPORTATION: Doctor Strange’s sling ring allows him to teleport himself or others, opening and closing portals to far-off locations.
powers+abilities.EYE OF AGAMATTO: The Eye of Agamatto, which is in fact the Time Stone, allows Strange to alter time around objects, locations, or other beings, or to see potential futures.
powers+abilities.CLOAK OF LEVITATION: Doctor Strange’s Cloak of Levitation allows him to fly, and can be used to grab hold of objects or enemies as needed.
